mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.CREATEDATE dateDay, SUM(A.USERTYPE_1) teacherNum,SUM(A.USERTYPE_2) delStudentNum,SUM(A.USERTYPE_3) graduateStudentNum FROM ( SELECT T.CREATEDATE, CASE WHEN T.USERTYPE = 1 THEN T.QTY ELSE 0 END USERTYPE_1, CASE WHEN T.USERTYPE = 2 THEN T.QTY ELSE 0 END USERTYPE_2, CASE WHEN T.USERTYPE = 3 THEN T.QTY ELSE 0 END USERTYPE_3 FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT A.CREATEDATE,A.USERTYPE ,COUNT(1) QTY FROM ms_decreaseuser_statistics A WHERE A.CREATEDATE BETWEEN #{condition.dateStart} and #{condition.dateEnd} GROUP BY A.CREATEDATE,A.USERTYPE) T ) A GROUP BY A.CREATEDATE) B ORDER BY B.dateDay ASC;
mapper.insert: insert into ms_decreaseuser_statistics(areaId, areaName, schoolId, schoolName,classId,className,userId,userType,createDate) values (#{areaId},#{areaName},#{schoolId},#{schoolName},#{classId},#{className},#{userId},#{userType},NOW())

INSERT INTO statistics.ms_user_day_wb_login_statistics ( userId, userType, classId, className, schoolId, schoolName, areaId, areaName, loginType, dateDay, num) SELECT userId, userType, classId, className, schoolId, schoolName, areaId, areaName, 1, dateDay, count(1) AS count FROM (
SELECT teacher_account_id as userId, 1 as userType, curdate() AS dateDay, c.class_id AS classId, c.className, c.school_id AS schoolId, c.schoolName AS schoolName, c.xzq_id AS areaId, c.areaName AS areaName from microschool_test.v_teacher_class c where c.teacher_account_id=#{userId} and c.className IS NOT NULL limit 1
SELECT parent_account_id as userId, 2 as userType, curdate() AS dateDay, c.class_id AS classId, c.className, c.school_id AS schoolId, c.schoolName, c.xzq_id AS areaId, c.areaName FROM microschool_test.v_parent_student_class c where c.parent_account_id =#{userId} and c.className IS NOT NULL limit 1
) aa GROUP BY classId, dateDay, userType, userId

INSERT INTO statistics.ms_user_day_action_statistics ( userId, userType, classId, className, schoolId, schoolName, areaId, areaName, loginType, dateDay, num, actionType ) SELECT userId, userType, classId, className, schoolId, schoolName, areaId, areaName, 1, dateDay, count(1) AS count, #{actionType} as actionType FROM (
SELECT teacher_account_id as userId, 1 as userType, curdate() AS dateDay, c.class_id AS classId, c.className, c.school_id AS schoolId, c.schoolName AS schoolName, c.xzq_id AS areaId, c.areaName AS areaName from microschool_test.v_teacher_class c where c.teacher_account_id=#{userId} and c.className IS NOT NULL limit 1
SELECT parent_account_id as userId, 2 as userType, curdate() AS dateDay, c.class_id AS classId, c.className, c.school_id AS schoolId, c.schoolName, c.xzq_id AS areaId, c.areaName FROM microschool_test.v_parent_student_class c where c.parent_account_id =#{userId} and c.className IS NOT NULL limit 1
) aa GROUP BY classId, dateDay, userType, userId
